summary: A collection of test scripts that exercise language model completion and embedding endpoints (OpenAI, Azure, Vertex AI) and related proxy services. They generate concurrent or bursty request traffic, capture timing and error information, compute performance statistics, and verify successful responses.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and assess the performance and scalability of LLM and embedding APIs under realistic load conditions, supporting proxy configurations and multiâ€‘modal models to guide capacity planning and SLA compliance.
